Background-position can be updated if mobile doesn't look right. Update image header copy below, doesn't show up below 480px width in most email clients Early Price ends July 27 Insert Copy Below, check for special characters and bad urls Strata Data Conference is coming to New York September 11-13. 		 Get an insider’s look at data's latest developments, review extraordinary technical expertise, and tap the brightest minds in data discussing the most important issues. Also, get full access to networking events, Findata Day , and Strata Business Summit . 		 Register today . Your last chance to save up to $679 on passes ends July 27. 		 Learn more Ben Lorica, Doug Cutting, and Alistair Croll Strata Program Chairs 		 The below has a padding of 0 to keep the spacing in one place, use this as the final copy . P.S. As a reader of KDnuggets, you can save an additional 20% on Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Findata Day passes with code KDNU (save up to $679 on a Gold pass).

Strata New York: Early Price ends July 27

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: New York, NY, O'Reilly, Strata

Strata Data Conference is coming to New York September 11-13. Register today. Your last chance to save up to $679 on passes ends July 27.


September 11–13 •  
New York
Early Price ends July 27
Strata Data Conference is coming to New York September 11-13.
Get an insider’s look at data's latest developments, review extraordinary technical expertise, and tap the brightest minds in data discussing the most important issues. Also, get full access to networking events, Findata Day, and Strata Business Summit.
Register today. Your last chance to save up to $679 on passes ends July 27.
Learn more
Ben Lorica, Doug Cutting, and Alistair Croll
Strata Program Chairs
P.S. As a reader of KDnuggets, you can save an additional 20% on Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Findata Day passes with code KDNU (save up to $679 on a Gold pass).
